front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions in support of End-to-End Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS)-based Recovery

abstract.t: This document describes protocol specific procedures and extensions for Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Resource ReserVation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) signaling to support end-to-end Label Switched Path (LSP) recovery that is protection and restoration. A generic functional description of GMPLS recovery can be found in a companion document.
